name: Radiohead Blank Erased Fixed
description: Edits to a blank Radiohead site My response to: http://gizmodo.com/radiohead-has-erased-itself-from-the-internet-1774198782 http://www.theguardian.com/music/2016/may/01/radiohead-erase-internet-presence-album-release I am Singularity Utopia. I am not connected to Radiohead or Hi Odd Area in any way. Install this style then visit radiohead.com to reveal the message. NOW BIGGER BOLDER BETTER - NEW AND IMPROVED!

user.name: Transhumanity
user.about: I am Singularity Utopia. This Transhumanity userstyles profile is where I place my less important styles to avoid cluttering my main profile. I am interested in AI risk, I think there is zero risk. I'm sure the Singularity will entail utopia Tweet something to me at @2045singularity if you have questions or compliments. You can also find me on G+, mainly via my page Singularity 2045.

additional_info: Boo! First version archive. Updates: 6 May 2016, 8 May, 9 May, 14 May (reticulated striations), 15 May, 16 May. Now that Radiohead are de-blanking their site this style will likely have a limited shelf-life.
